summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 66E, page 160 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 6217 Rainier Avenue South from Lowrise (L3) to Lowrise 3 with a Residential/Commercial designation (L3/RC); and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Ray Akers, (C.F. 302631, Appl. 9706198)
